story.kicker_image_caption: DDA is hiring for 675 Deputy Director, Assistant Director, other post
story.storykicker: The Delhi Development Authority (DDA) has released a notification inviting interested, eligible candidates to apply for the posts of Deputy Director, Assistant Director, other posts. The candidates may send the applications in the prescribed format on or before June 20.
story.storybody:
The Delhi Development Authority (DDA) has released a notification inviting interested, eligible candidates to apply for the posts of Deputy Director, Assistant Director, other posts. The candidates may send the applications in a prescribed format on or before June 20.

Vacancy details:

Total posts: 675

Post wise vacancy details:

  • Deputy Director (Public Relation): 1
  • Deputy Director (Planning): 7
  • Assistant Director (Planning): 12
  • Assistant Director (Ministerial): 15
  • Assistant Accounts Officer: 80
  • Legal Assistant: 24
  • Assistant Section Engineer: 80
  • Sectional Engineer:  101
  • Junior Engineer (Civil): 240
  • Junior Engineer (Electrical/ Mechanical): 59
  • Junior Translator: 6
  • Stenographer Grade- D: 30
  • Patwari: 20

Eligibility criteria:

Educational qualification:

Deputy Director (Public Relation): The candidates should possess a PG diploma degree in Journalism/ Mass Communication/  Public relation/Advertisement or equivalent from a recognised university or institute.

Deputy Director (Planning): The candidates should possess a Bachelor's degree in Planning/Architecture/ Civil/ Municipal Engineering or a Master degree in Geography/Sociology/Economics with Post graduation in Planning and an added specialisation in any of the field of Town/ City/ Urban/ Housing/ Transport/ Environmental Planning from a recognised university or institute. The candidates should have a minimum 5 years of experience in concerned field with development authority or local body or in a government undertaking.

Assistant Director (Planning):  The candidates should possess a Bachelor's degree in Planning/Architecture/Civil/Municipal Engineering or Master's Degree in Geography/Sociology/Economics with post graduation in Planning with specialization in any of the fields of Town/ City/ Urban/ Housing/ Transport/ Environmental Planning from a recognised university/institute.

Assistant Director (Ministerial):  The candidates should have completed an MBA in (HR/Personnel/Industrial Relation/Real Estate/Urban Management, Finance & Marketing).

For post wise educational qualification details please check the notification.

How to apply:

The candidates may apply in the prescribed format through the official website as per notification.

Important dates:

  • Opening date for on-line registration of application: May 21
  • Last date for completion of Step-I of on-line registration: June 14
  • Last date for the deposition of application fee at SBI: June 17
  • Last date for the submission of online application: June 20
